name: Mersia Muses
description:
Hello and Welcome to Mersia! The land where you collect Muses and compete in Spotlight Battles in order to become a Superstar. This is an alpha demo with my hope for a full demo in Spring 2021. Please feel free to give feedback and advice.

CONTROLS :

Web - Mouse & Keyboard (up, down, left, right & enter), For Rhythm Game - (left, down, right)

Android - Touch

Merisa Muses is an upcoming Monster Taming Rhythm game made by a first time solo game developer in a 2d Pixel Art style. This is a demo to show the basic workings of the game so a lot will be changing with time. Made using Godot on Chromebook and with Samsung Note phone for graphics.
